data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Lozère to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lozère, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Lozère, Occitanie, France.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Lozère.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Lozère, Occitanie, France to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Iu Mien people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Lozère words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Lozère, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Lozère, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Lozère
location.cities_list: Mende, Marvejols, Saint-Chély-d‘Apcher, Langogne, La Canourgue
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mende (14,837), Marvejols (6,086), Saint-Chély-d‘Apcher (4,160), Langogne (3,490), La Canourgue (2,126)
